note:
Con alivio, con humillación, con terror, comprendió que él también era una apariencia, que otro estaba soñándolo.

—

PhD (number theory/arithmetic geometry)
Musician (🎷🎺🎹🎸 but also clarinet and bass, mostly jazz these days), I also love writing music!
Knitting, tea, bike travel, pastry. Linguistics and other language-related nerdy stuff are my special interests.

—

🖤🤍💜
